history.content: I was admitted before Fall 2015 (Spring 2012) and will soon be petitioning for a double major in CS (I'm currently minoring in CS). On the application, the earliest date for "First Semester at UC Berkeley" is Spring 2016 and it only prepopulates my grades for CS 61A, CS 61B and CS 70. I'm taking CS 61C in the summer and plan to petition before August 30th (I've finished everything else). What should I choose for "First Semester at UC Berkeley" and will the department somehow see my admittance date and process me correctly (wait for my grade in CS 61C)?
history.subject: Admitted Before Fall 2015
